tasks.name: Cued Speech (CS) Perception Task
tasks.definition: Participants watched videos of a hearing female French speaker saying a randomized list of 45 bisyllabic frequent words under three conditions: (1) Cued Speech labial + manual (CSLM), (2) Cued Speech manual only (CSM), and (3) Cued Speech oral only (lipreading) (CSL). The task was to press a button when they detected the target word 'papa'.

tasks.name: Audiovisual (AV) Speech Perception Task
tasks.definition: Participants watched videos of a hearing female French speaker saying a randomized list of 45 bisyllabic frequent words under three conditions: (1) Speech audiovisual (speech AV), (2) Speech auditory (speech A), and (3) Speech visual (lipreading) (speech V). The task was to press a button when they detected the target word 'papa'.
contrasts: speech AV > speech A + speech V
